name: Hypothermia (Ren, Ikesawa Kie, nightingbell)
description:
You've crash landed in the research facility Eden-1. With your ship in a state of disrepair, it's up to you to explore the facility and fix your vessel before you freeze to death...

Experimentation with creating a visual novel in Godot! Created for Godot Wild Jam #53.

Uses Dialogic for Godot 3.5.
